message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I am comfortable offering $14,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
